ARABIC: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: not tasting any coolness there or any drink,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Finding neither sleep nor any thing to drink
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: they shall taste in it no coolness, nor any pleasant drink
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will not feel cold nor taste any drink
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They will neither taste anything cool in it, nor anything to drink.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nothing cool shall they taste therein, nor any drink.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They shall not taste therein cool nor drink
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: tasting therein neither coolness nor any drink
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Therein taste they neither coolness nor (any) drink
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and where they will taste neither coolness nor any drink
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They will not taste therein cool or any drink.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: tasting in it neither any coolness nor drink,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nothing cool shall they taste therein, nor any drink,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nothing cool shall they taste therein, nor any drink.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: tasting neither coolness nor any drink
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will taste therein neither coolness, nor drink.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They will not taste therein [any] coolness or drink
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:24] tasting in it neither coolness, [neither] sleep, [something] which they will not taste [therein], nor drink, [nor] anything that is imbibed for the sake of its delightful taste,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Therein) in the Fire (taste they neither coolness) cool water; and it is also said this means: sleep (nor (any) drink) cold drink
